jobDescription: We are seeking a Data Analyst to perform analytical tasks for the purpose of developing, analyzing, and distributing sales and productivity reports to management as well as other staff. This position reports into the Finance Department, but works directly with the Lead Development and Inside Sales Teams.JOB REQUIREMENTS/PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIESCreates custom and standard reports for management and sales staffReviews forms and reports to determine weak areas and make improvementsTrains staff on proper use of new forms and reportsAnalyzes work flows and lead flows and makes recommendations for streamlining or improving the processHelps develop new sales leads for the companyProduces statistical models to help predict market trendsBuild and manages sales reports and dashboards.Assists sales leaders to work with sales teams on data accuracyAnalyzes the techniques and successes of the competitionMay conduct market research and recommend market strategies for the purpose of enhancing company salesOther duties assignedSKILLS/ABILITIESExperience with Salesforce.com CRM (building reports and dashboards, data extraction and analysis), requiredExtensive Excel and Access Database experience (including pivot tables), requiredMust have strong interpersonal skillsMust have excellent analytical and research skillsMust have superior written and verbal communication skills as well as solid presentation skillsMust have strong organizational skills and the ability to effectively prioritize tasksMust have good problem solving and decision making skillsMust have good negotiation and persuasion skillsMust have excellent math skillsMust be detail orientedMust have solid conflict resolution skillsEDUCATION/EXPERIENCEBachelor’s degree in Business, Operations, Accounting, Analytics, Finance or Marketing, requiredExperience in sales and marketing, preferredExperience in professional services environment, preferred Partners In Leadership is the world’s premier provider of Accountability Training® and Culture Change services and selected as one of the 2017 Top Workplaces in the Inland Empire. Our mission as a consulting firm is to help our clients achieve their mission, and our #1 award-winning content and global network of professionals across the world have enabled thousands of companies and millions of people to achieve dramatic results, reporting billions of dollars in improved shareholder wealth, saving hundreds of thousands of jobs resulting in some of the highest praised and best places to work in the world.  Come partner with us for competitive pay, continuous growth and learning and an awesome team environment,
